meanings.definition: Having knowledge or skill in a particular area gained through practice or exposure.
meanings.sent1: The experienced chef effortlessly whipped up a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: She is an experienced teacher who knows how to engage her students.
meanings.sent3: The experienced hiker could navigate the trail blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: Her experienced hands worked magic with the paintbrush.
meanings.sent5: The experienced sailor could read the sea like a book.

meanings.definition: Having been through a particular event or situation.
meanings.sent1: The experienced traveler had visited over fifty countries.
meanings.sent2: He was an experienced driver who had survived many road trips.
meanings.sent3: The experienced party-goer knew all the best dance moves.
meanings.sent4: Her experienced taste buds could detect the slightest hint of spice.
meanings.sent5: The experienced actor could convey emotions with just a glance.
